titleStmt.title: A proclamation ... whereas by our royal proclamation of the date the 12 day of February 1686/7 James R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At head of title: By the King a proclamation.
At end of text: Given at our court at Windsor the 28 day of June, 1687.
